page.title: 04HOUSING
page.content: There is a variety of housing styles in this area, some{detatched}and some {semi-detatched houses and bungalows} built in the last thirty years. Heidi Ward lives in a very old, stone cottage called Marsh Cottage which is by the railway bridge in Pilning. It is a listed building and has interesting features. There are some large old{farmhouses} built of limestone scattered throughout the area, most{cottages} have been renovated and modernised for commuters. In Severn Beach there are some popular old people's{flats,}looked after by a resident warden. 20% of the population live in{caravans}on permanent sites. Few new houses have been built in recent years. Three children in our school live in{Public Houses}and four live on farms. Deborah Hunt.
